subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The first Winter Classic ice hockey game, in Orchard Park, N.Y., on Jan. 1, 2008, turned out to be a big step in the league’s return to significance.
snippet: The first Winter Classic ice hockey game, in Orchard Park, N.Y., on Jan. 1, 2008, turned out to be a big step in the league’s return to significance.
